title: FESTIVE PERIOD CLOSURE
content:
Please note that the SACPVP Offices will be closed from 13th December 2024. Staff will return to work from 6th January 2025 onwards.

During this holiday season more than any other time, Our thoughts turn gratefully to all of those who have made our progress possible. In this spirit we say, simply but sincerely THANK YOU AND BEST WISHES for the Holiday Season and a Happy New Year Wishes from the President; Councillors and the Admin Staff
